FuncDef:
The hwtacacs command displays the port extension HWTACACS view.
By default, the hwtacacs view exists.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enter the port extension HWTACACS view in the port extension scenario, run the hwtacacs command. You can configure the TACACS server for a login AP.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
